## Preparation {#sec-prepro-preparation}

For Prepro 1 - 3, we will need the following packages: `dplyr`, `ggplot2`, `lubridate`, `readr` and `tidyr`. We recommend installing them *before* the first lesson. Individual packages cann be installed as follows:

```{r}
#| eval: false

install.packages(c("dplyr", "ggplot2", "lubridate", "readr", "tidyr"))
```




You can download the datasets for the exercises from Moodle:

- [PrePro1](https://moodle.zhaw.ch/mod/folder/view.php?id=1185299)
- [PrePro2](https://moodle.zhaw.ch/mod/folder/view.php?id=1185301)
- [PrePro3](https://moodle.zhaw.ch/mod/folder/view.php?id=1185315)
